column4: Is a dell mini 10v netbook with 1.6GHZ cpu, 1GB ram and 16 gb SSD drive going to run Ubuntu fine?  And would the netbook remix be a better choice?  I'm looking to surf and code python on it...
the netbook remix is designed for the dell mini -- works great
Ah right I wasn't sure if it was the mini 9 or mini 10 it was designed for
Dell actually has an iso for the dell mini's
